content: thick warm garter stitch slippers knit with worsted weight yarn held double and no seaming aussi disponible en français **materials ** approx 250 yards of northbound knitting superwash merino worsted held double size us 8 5 mm dpns or size needed to obtain gauge stitch markers tapestry needle **gauge ** 3 sts=1 in stockinette stitch **finished measurements ** women s size 5-6=9 long women s size 7-8=9 5 long women s size 9-10=10 long **abbreviations used ** k=knit p=purl rs=right side ws=wrong side st s =stitch es pm=place marker sm=slip marker kf&b=knit into the front and back of same stitch
